sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我们需要买一些新家具。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen xūyào mǎi yīxiē xīn jiājù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous devons acheter de nouveaux meubles.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We need to buy some new furniture.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ jīhū měitiān dōu yùndòng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je fais de l'exercice presque tous les jours.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I exercise almost every day.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xièxie nǐ guānxīn wǒ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Merci de te soucier de moi.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Thank you for caring about me.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège xiāoxi hǎo jíle!
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette nouvelle est fantastique !
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This news is fantastic!

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 春天是我最喜欢的季节。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Chūntiān shì wǒ zuì xǐhuan de jìjié.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le printemps est ma saison préférée.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Spring is my favorite season.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì wǒmen yánjiū de chéngguǒ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est le résultat de notre recherche.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is the result of our research.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Lǎoshī de jiǎngjiě hěn shēngdòng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'explication du professeur est très vivante.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The teacher's explanation is very vivid.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì yī gè mínjiān gùshi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est un conte populaire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is a folk story.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xūyào yī zhī bǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai besoin d'un stylo.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I need a pen.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xuéhǎo jīchǔ hěn zhòngyào.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est important d'apprendre les bases.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: It's important to learn the basics well.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè tiáo jiēdào hěn rènao.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette rue est très animée.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This street is very lively.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen qù shìchǎng mǎi cài.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous allons au marché acheter des légumes.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We go to the market to buy vegetables.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège wèntí xiāngdāng fùzá.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce problème est assez complexe.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This problem is quite complex.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nóngmín zài dì lǐ zhòng zhǒngzi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'agriculteur plante des graines dans le champ.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The farmer plants seeds in the field.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng jǔshǒu tíwèn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Levez la main pour poser une question.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please raise your hand to ask a question.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这项投资有一定的风险。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè xiàng tóuzī yǒu yīdìng de fēngxiǎn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cet investissement comporte un certain risque.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This investment carries some risk.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Bié dānxīn, yīqiè dōu huì hǎo de.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ne t'inquiète pas, tout ira bien.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Don't worry, everything will be fine.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 医生给我做了全面检查。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Yīshēng gěi wǒ zuò le quánmiàn jiǎnchá.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le médecin m'a fait un examen complet.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The doctor gave me a complete examination.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Guānzhòng gěi le rèliè de zhǎngshēng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le public a donné des applaudissements enthousiastes.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The audience gave warm applause.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我想了解更多关于中国的文化。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng liǎojiě gèng duō guānyú Zhōngguó de wénhuà.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je veux en savoir plus sur la culture chinoise.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I want to learn more about Chinese culture.
